definitions.definition: ( countable , military ) A ( short ) cessation of combat . [from late 17th c.]
( countable , military ) A formal agreement , especially between nations , to end combat.

main_definition: ( countable , military ) A ( short ) cessation of combat . [from late 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( countable , military ) A formal agreement , especially between nations , to end combat.

definitions.definition: Alternative letter-case form of Armistice ( “ the armistice agreement signed between the Allies and Germany on 11 November 1918 to end World War I ; ( by extension ) the end of World War I ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative letter-case form of Armistice ( “ the armistice agreement signed between the Allies and Germany on 11 November 1918 to end World War I ; ( by extension ) the end of World War I ” ) .
